This morning, a container truck caught
fire while traveling on
Ho Chi Minh City's Long Thanh Expressway. The
fire caused serious congestion on the expressway and the
road leading to Thu Duc City.
In about 6:4 minutes, a container truck
pulling a trailer drove on
Ho Chi Minh City's Long Thanh Dau Expressway heading

station's firefighting force.  Long Phuoc toll collector came to
